content: {"name": "Victory in Christ Ministries", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Located behind H.O.P.E Outlet & Victory in Christ Ministries in H.O.P.E Plaza\nOptional $10 donation towards the pantry", "email": "", "url": "https://www.victoryinchrist.life/food-pantry", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "6398 Georgia 85", "address_2": null, "city": "Riverdale", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30274", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 33.5803631, "longitude": -84.4109517}, "phones": [{"number": "(770) 778-8572", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "19:30", "closes_at": "21:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Come early to make a line starting at 9am"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "No ID is required."}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "First come, first serve: open until food runs out"}]}
